name: Auro The Bunny
description:
Auro The Bunny is a game in which you'll control a rabbit who'll have to collect the fruits he finds along the way, avoiding obstacles such as saws, scythes and even lava. Are you ready for this challenge?



This game includes:

- Three distinct scenarios
- Several Obstacles such as Saws, Sickles and even Lava
- Many Challenges
- Beautiful Soundtrack
